trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around October 16th 1980
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were at the Columbus Marathon in do,wntown Columbus. It was a clear, warm day. For whatever reason, I looked directly above me, and I saw a white object that looked similar to a lear jet. It was at least a mile above me, looking about four inches long. I nudged my girl and pointed to it. It moved forward, then backward, then sideways left, then sideways right, then up, then down, all in about 5 seconds. Then it hovered in place for a couple seconds, then took off at incredible speed, disappearing in one second max. I asked my girlfriend "Did you see that?". She said she saw it too.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
Summary: Saw object move like no aircraft can and at speeds which no aircraft can obtain.
